title: ennai shOdanai
sahitya:
ennai shOdanai sheyyAdE uLLam irangi enait-tAngikkoL ippOdE


anupallavi

  unaip-pirinAl enakkengE shenrAlum tollai unran tuNai illAmal enakkengum inbamillai


caraNam    anbargaLukkum kaNyan dIna sharaNyan abhayam tarum lAvaNyan unpOl deivam
 vEruNDO anbAl nAn marandAlum en pizhaiyai-pArATTi tunba shuzhalil mATTi
